EmailTemplate.name: CHN-2017-12 Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Training Denver.Reminder 1 Week
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Denver Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Program December 13-14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for registering to attend the Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Training in Denver! This is your reminder that the event is coming up next week from December 13th – 14th, 2017, at the Denver Marriott Tech Center.
Agenda:
- Wednesday, December 13th, 8:30am – 4:30pm*
- Wednesday, December 13th, 6:00pm – 8:00pm - Dinner
- Thursday, December 14th, 8:30am – 3:30pm*
* meals and parking will be provided
Location: Denver Marriott Tech Center 4900 South Syracuse Street Denver, CO 80237 Tel: (303) 779-1100
If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out!
Regards, Laura Nielsen West Coast Channel Manager
